interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Thor [DVD] Review Date: 2014/03/10 Store: Chris Hemsworth (Actor), Natalie Portman (Actor), Kenneth Branagh (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure Product Description: ['The world has many heroes...but only one is a god. When the arrogant warrior Thor (Chris Hemsworth, STAR TREK) is banished to the Earth from his homeworld of Asgard, he must fight to reclaim his lost powers. Pursued by an invasion force sent to destroy him, the fallen God of Thunder must rise to the battle and learn what it takes to become a true hero. Natalie Portman (BLACK SWAN) and Anthony Hopkins (BEOWULF) also star in the blockbuster adventure critics are calling "thrilling, entertaining and cool" (Harry Knowles, Ain\'t It Cool News).Note: This title does go though a manual rework process.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD11899700DVD', 'Director': 'Kenneth Branagh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 24, 2013', 'Actors': 'Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'MARVEL', 'Writers': 'Ashley Edward Miller, Zack Stentz, Don Payne, J. Michael Straczynski, Mark Protosevich', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: You could run across your own Super Hero like oh say, Chris Hemsworth! I mean "HELLO", I melt and he's just on a DVD or movie screen or walking down a Red Carpet, wherever makes no difference.

Of course this Thor is the same. Loves his family, his people, all the surrounding planets or in our world, surrounding States and Cities. A true Soldier/Warrior. Respect his parents and even loves his troublesome brother! I have to say I really like this Loki character. Yes he is bad and self enter. But got the attitude of Garfield the Cat and really comical. So yeah I don't think you can have a Thor flick without Loki. Together the brothers compliment each other, tho you wish Loki wasn't so destructive on humankind like he can be. Yes we have romance, anger, some really Ugly bad guys, a crazy Professior and comedy and unfortunately loss of a loved one. So Thor's like us and his home has problems as ours does and we too lose Loved Ones. He just does it with grace and one Heck of a hammer!!
Can't wait for the new Captian America coming to theaters 4/4/14!
Hope you enjoy Thor: The Dark World. Full of action!!
Dezi Review Title: If only... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user has a strong preference for action and adventure films, particularly those featuring superhero themes and elements of fantasy. The engagement with the genre indicates an inclination towards engaging narratives with dynamic characters.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user enjoys well-developed relationships between characters, valuing themes of family and loyalty, as demonstrated by the appreciation for the familial dynamics between Thor and Loki. They show an interest in humor alongside action, indicating a preference for a blend of genres.

- **Actor and Director Recognition:** The user is drawn to specific actors, particularly those who portray strong, charismatic characters (e.g., Chris Hemsworth), suggesting they follow certain stars and may be influenced by their performances in driving purchasing decisions.

- **Rating Systems:** The user tends to favor high-rated films, as hinted by the 5-star rating for the product evaluated. This suggests they may be influenced by critical and viewer acclaim when selecting films.

- **Anticipation of Releases:** The user displays enthusiasm for upcoming films, indicating they actively follow release schedules and enjoy partaking in cinematic culture, suggesting a commitment to ongoing engagement with the film community.

Overall, this user demonstrates a clear passion for superhero-themed, action-oriented movies that balance drama and lightheartedness, with a particular fondness for narratives that explore personal relationships and character growth.
